title: ONE YEAR LOVE - Part Two
description: The second part of ONE YEAR LOVE, a four part series from Amazon bestselling author Devon Hartford.  When the rugged and enigmatic billionaire business man Drakken Skalakova swoops into River Freeman’s life, he opens her mind and her legs to infinite possibilities. He reminds her that she’s still strong and full of life. He offers her the promise of excitement, passion, and scorching hot sex.  But Drakken remains as mysterious and aloof as the day they met. River knows almost nothing about the man except that he knows how to rock her world. What secrets is Drakken still hiding?  NOTE: This ends in a cliffhanger. Part Three will be released in two weeks.
author: Devon Hartford
